The original photograph: as posted to Abrams' own Twitter account, does not show her holding a campaign sign identifying her as a "Communist" or including the hashtag "#MuslimBrotherhood".
Abrams: director of communications confirmed that the photograph was doctored and that Abrams has no affiliations with communist organizations or the Muslim Brotherhood.
Linda Sarsour: who is seen in the photograph with Abrams, has denied supporting the Islamic State group and Abrams has been a strong supporter of Israel and the Jewish community.
